summary: In 1976, a lower-middle-class teenager struggles to cope living with her neurotic family of nomads on the outskirts of Beverly Hills.
cast: Natasha Lyonne|Alan Arkin|Bryna Weiss|Marisa Tomei|Charlotte Stewart|Eli Marienthal|David Krumholtz|Kevin Corrigan|Brendan Burns|Harris Laskawy|Jessica Walter|Mena Suvari|Marley McClean|Mary Portser|Jock MacDonald|Rich Willis|Armand Reiser|Jack Tracy|Jay Patterson|Natalie Karp|Carl Reiner|Rita Moreno|Sally Schaub|Mykal Wayne Williams
keywords: coming of age|sexual awakening|on the lam|virgin|uncle niece relationship
title: Colgados en Beverly Hills
